description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Muscat, Oman. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.title: Five-Star Muscat City Break near Qurum Beach with Six Onsite Restaurants
hotels.description: Discover the treasures of Oman with an escape to the five-star InterContinental Muscat, an IHG Hotel, perfectly positioned on the shores of the shimmering Gulf of Oman. Spend the day soaking in the culture of the city: explore one of the largest mosques in the Middle East, stroll through authentic local souks, or spend lazy days lounging at Qurum Beach. Then, return to your opulent accommodation and visit one of the seven onsite eateries or take a refreshing dip in the glistening outdoor pool.

hotels.title: Muscat Luxury Overlooking the Shatti Al-Qurum Beachfront with Five Onsite Eateries & Traditional Spa
hotels.description: Experience the epitome of Omani elegance at the Mandarin Oriental, Muscat, a beacon of luxury overlooking the sparkling shores of Shatti Al-Qurum. This opulent hotel invites you to indulge in culinary delights at the five world-class dining venues, each offering a unique gastronomic journey from the Italian flavours of Essenza to the seaside atmosphere of Sì Breeze. When you’re not exploring the glittering city, unwind with ease in the opulent spa with a traditional hammam ritual.

hotels.title: Five-Star Muscat Shangri-La Resort on the Shores of the Gulf of Oman
hotels.description: Experience dramatic natural vistas, regal opulence, and authentic Arabian hospitality with a stay at the five-star Shangri-La Al Husn, set in a magnificent castle on the shores of the Gulf of Oman. Rated in the Top 25 Hotels for Romance in the Middle East on Tripadvisor, each of the 180 rooms and suites has décor inspired by Arabian palaces and the resort is also home to the largest entry-level rooms in Muscat. Go beyond the ornate lobby and discover the stunning central courtyard and the luxurious Luban Spa, as well as mouthwatering eateries including Aangan by Rohit Ghai, serving celebrated contemporary Indian cuisine; Sultanah where you can savour Mediterranean delicacies, and fan-favourites Mahhara Beach Bar and Al Muheet pool bar. Guests can also enjoy signing privileges at a variety of dining venues across adjacent sister property, Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah. Further luxurious amenities and privileges include a secluded private beach, a clifftop infinity pool, and state-of-the-art fitness centre.

hotels.title: Muscat Stay with World-Class Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Experience modern sustainability, authentic Arabian cuisine and renowned hospitality at the Crowne Plaza Muscat OCEC, an IHG Hotel,set within the brand-new Madinat Al Irfan district in the Omani capital of Muscat. Each of the exceptionally comfortable rooms and suites boasts luxe, Arabian-inspired interiors, while the resort's mouthwatering eateries, infinity pool, spa and state-of-the-art health club ensure complete comfort.

hotels.title: Oman Luxurious Muscat Escape with Rooftop Infinity Pool & Wellness Spa
hotels.description: Discover Muscat from the comfort of this five-star oasis in the Ghala Heights Complex - just minutes from the iconic Sultan Qaboos Grand Mosque. This Mövenpick sanctuary offers a rich culinary scene, from Butcher House, a modern take on the classic steakhouse, to The Watchtower, serving creative cocktails paired with DJ beats. After a day of exploring the capital, unwind in the rooftop infinity pool or with a personalised treatment at NOVE Spa, complete with a tranquil salt room and detoxifying sauna. Whether enjoying date-inspired pastries at Dates & Co, or staying active in the fitness centre with skyline vistas, this hotel blends luxury, pure comfort and serenity in historic Oman.

hotels.title: Muscat Kempinski Beachfront Bliss with 11 World-Class Restaurants & Bars
hotels.description: Experience regal opulence, authentic Arabian cuisine and renowned hospitality at the five-star Kempinski Hotel Muscat, set within the waterfront district of Al Mouj on the shores of the Gulf of Oman. Each of the exceptionally comfortable rooms and suites boasts luxe, Arabian-inspired interiors, while the resort is superbly set on the glittering coastline. Go beyond the ornate lobby and discover the luxurious Kempinski The Spa, as well as 11 mouthwatering eateries including The Kitchen, an all-day dining experience; Café One where you can savour fresh pastries, and fan-favourites Bukhara and the Pool Bar. Guests can also enjoy further luxurious amenities and privileges including a secluded private beach, two swimming pools, a kids club, a tennis court, and a state-of-the-art health club.

hotels.vendor_name: Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah Resort & Spa
hotels.title: Muscat Five-Star Shangri-La Resort on the Shores of the Gulf of Oman
hotels.description: Experience the luxury haven of Shangri-La Barr Al Jissah, Muscat, a resort designed with inspiration from Oman’s rich heritage and natural landscape and ranked in the top 10% of properties on Tripadvisor. Set against a backdrop of the Al Hajar Mountains, cradled by a myriad of crags and coves on the shores of the Gulf of Oman, this indulgent oasis offers outstanding facilities including opulent Moorish and Omanian-style interiors, gold-tiled fountains, a central palm-filled courtyard, and private beach. There are also nine restaurants, five bars, a private beach bar, luxurious treatments at the spa, and more than 1,700 kilometres of coastline for guests to discover.

hotels.title: Oman Beachfront Luxury with an Ocean-Facing Infinity Pool
hotels.description: Let the beach magic of Oman sweep you off your feet at Crowne Plaza Muscat, an IHG Hotel, a slice of oceanfront bliss perched on the clifftop of Qurum Heights. Drink in the beauty of the surrounding landscape from the panoramic terraces, watch the sunset from the infinity swimming pool and laze on the private beach. Gourmands are spoilt for choice with an array of dining options from Persian to an international buffet and Italian cuisine, all set on the terrace overlooking the ocean.

seo.title: Hoteles en Muscat - Oman Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Muscat, Oman con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
